attributes.action: Change to get more help for mental health
attributes.additional_details: Need more funding from the government
attributes.background: We need more funding going towards mental health in the uk to help people struggling as there is nothing out there !!!!

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705221

If you're concerned about yourself or a loved one, find out how you can get help from a mental health charity or organisation: https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-services/mental-health-services/
